full_summary:
================================

**Tender Opportunity**

**Notification Reference Number** : cb-14-26674113

**Solicitation Number** : 23-58240

**Project Title** : TBIPS 23-58240 - Project Management Services

**Overview**
------------

The National Research Council Canada, Knowledge Information and Technology Services (KITS) Branch, is seeking the services of consultants through a competitive request for proposal (RFP) process. The purpose of this tender is to identify suitable vendors to provide project management services in response to the on-going demand to execute IM/IT related projects.

**Tender Description**
------------------------

The selected consultant(s) will be responsible for providing expert project management services as and when needed to manage and execute various IM/IT projects under the KITS Branch.

**Important Dates**
------------------

*   **Publication Date**: Thursday, March 13, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, April 11, 2024, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Key Requirements**
--------------------

The following trade agreements are applicable to this tender:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**
------------------------

For any questions or clarification related to this tender, please contact:

*   Roxanne Azzi Abboud
*   roxanneazziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
*   (613) 299-9650

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

The tender notice and amendments can be accessed on the Government of Canada – Buyandsell.gc.ca website. A response to this solicitation must be submitted according to the process and instructions outlined in the  RFP document. 

Please note that the deadline to submit the response is on Thursday, April 11, 2024.
